These backgrounds are found in Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Intrigue.

Name: Nemesis
PrerequisitesString: You must have at least one enemy who wishes to cause you great harm. If you have multiple enemies, the GM may keep the specific nemesis secret, or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your nemesis is not already a challenging foe, it either advances in strength to become a challenging foe or allies with others to achieve a higher challenge rating.
Description: Gain extra benefits when leveling in your favored class
Prerequisites: You must have at least one enemy who wishes to cause you great harm. If you have multiple enemies
the GM may keep the specific nemesis secret
or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your nemesis is not already a challenging foe
it either advances in strength to become a challenging foe or allies with others to achieve a higher challenge rating.

Name: Never Conquered, Forever Feared
PrerequisitesString: Be a member of House Heskillar, or have the Adopted by Dragons, Path of Righteous Rage, or Proud Heritage background
Description: Gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks and on saving throws against paralysis and sleep
Prerequisites: Be a member of House Heskillar
or have the Adopted by Dragons

Name: Noble Impostor
PrerequisitesString: Must not be a member of an established family or a member of nobility
Description: Gain a +2 bonus on Bluff and Knowledge (nobility)
Prerequisites: Must not be a member of an established family or a member of nobility

Name: Object of Legend
PrerequisitesString: You must have some highly personal stake in attaining the object of your quest as determined collectively by you and the GM'such as needing an ancestral weapon to exact your revenge against a known betrayer, seeking to destroy the artifact that caused your family's downfall generations ago, or attempting to behead a monster that ravaged your homeland during your youth.
Description: Acquire great power and skill
Prerequisites: You must have some highly personal stake in attaining the object of your quest as determined collectively by you and the GM'such as needing an ancestral weapon to exact your revenge against a known betrayer
seeking to destroy the artifact that caused your family's downfall generations ago
or attempting to behead a monster that ravaged your homeland during your youth.

Name: Otherworldly Influence
PrerequisitesString: You must have refused an evil creature with at least 15 Hit Dice who offered gifts or assistance, have refused an evil creature offering to cast a spell of 7th-level or higher on your behalf, or have the Planar Offering background
Description: Bonus on negotiations with evil outsiders
Prerequisites: You must have refused an evil creature with at least 15 Hit Dice who offered gifts or assistance
have refused an evil creature offering to cast a spell of 7th-level or higher on your behalf
or have the Planar Offering background

Name: Our Bounty, Our Glory
PrerequisitesString: Be a member of House Denzarni, or have the Bloodthirsty, Omen, Tree Tender, or Unsuspecting Master background
Description: You can go longer without food and water
Prerequisites: Be a member of House Denzarni

Name: Overachiever
PrerequisitesString: You must have been defeated by the same individual, organization, or creature type at least four times, or have the Boarding School or Humiliated background
Description: Take less penalties from exhaustion, forgo rest to improve skills
Prerequisites: You must have been defeated by the same individual
or creature type at least four times
or have the Boarding School or Humiliated background

Name: Planar Traveler
PrerequisitesString: You must be related to an outsider or have been born on a plane other than the Material Plane.
Description: Enhance your survival outside of your home plane
Prerequisites: You must be related to an outsider or have been born on a plane other than the Material Plane.

Name: Prophet
PrerequisitesString: Ability to cast divine spells, and you must either have received a vision from your god (or another appropriate supernatural entity) or have the Marked by the Gods background (see Ultimate Campaign).
Description: Increase your defenses when buffing allies
Prerequisites: and you must either have received a vision from your god (or another appropriate supernatural entity) or have the Marked by the Gods background (see Ultimate Campaign).

Name: Prosperity and Pride
PrerequisitesString: Be a member of House Corcina, or have the Craftsperson, Inheritance, Well-Connected Friend, or Worldshaker background
Description: Gain a +2 bonus on Appraise and Diplomacy checks in large cities
Prerequisites: Be a member of House Corcina

Name: Protector of the People
PrerequisitesString: See text
Description: Gain the ability to make a golem protector, and on completion, gain Craft Construct at a conditional 10% discount

Name: Puppet Master
PrerequisitesString: You must have survived an encounter with a challenging foe without suffering significant harm by striking a deal (regardless of whether the deal was with the challenging foe or not), or have the BossUCA, the Liege LordUCA, or the Well-Connected FriendUCA background
Description: Make successive Diplomacy checks more easily.
Prerequisites: You must have survived an encounter with a challenging foe without suffering significant harm by striking a deal (regardless of whether the deal was with the challenging foe or not)

Name: Redemption
PrerequisitesString: You must have lost class features by violating the code of conduct of a class that possesses such a code, or have the Dishonored Family background.
Description: Face fear in order to gain bonuses
Prerequisites: You must have lost class features by violating the code of conduct of a class that possesses such a code
or have the Dishonored Family background.

Name: Rival
PrerequisitesString: You must have at least one enemy who wishes to outdo you. If you have multiple rivals, the GM may keep the specific rival secret, or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your rival is not already a challenging foe, it either advances to become one or allies itself with others one or more creatures who are
Description: Gain extra skill points or Fame.
Prerequisites: You must have at least one enemy who wishes to outdo you. If you have multiple rivals
the GM may keep the specific rival secret
or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your rival is not already a challenging foe
it either advances to become one or allies itself with others one or more creatures who are

Name: Self-Exiled Noble
PrerequisitesString: You must have intentionally left your noble family and changed your name or appearance afterward
Description: Gain a +2 bonus on Disguise and a +1 bonus on attack and damage against family members
Prerequisites: You must have intentionally left your noble family and changed your name or appearance afterward

Name: Shamed
PrerequisitesString: You must have been publicly embarrassed, or must have the Bastard Born background. If the embarrassment didn't cause significant harm to your personal honor or social standing, it does not qualify for the feat prerequisites. The humiliation doesn't need to have been unjustified.
Description: Get bonuses in combat when observed by others
Prerequisites: You must have been publicly embarrassed
or must have the Bastard Born background. If the embarrassment didn't cause significant harm to your personal honor or social standing
it does not qualify for the feat prerequisites. The humiliation doesn't need to have been unjustified.

Name: Standing Tall
PrerequisitesString: Be a member of House Fahlspar, or have the Hunter, Nature, or Tree Tender background
Description: Once per day, gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against mind-affecting effects
Prerequisites: Be a member of House Fahlspar

Name: Stronghold
PrerequisitesString: You must have the Leadership feat and must lead at least 10 combat-capable followers (such as fighters or rangers).
Description: Enhance troops under your command
Prerequisites: You must have the Leadership feat and must lead at least 10 combat-capable followers (such as fighters or rangers).

Name: Supernatural Spy
PrerequisitesString: Alchemist discovery, arcane discovery, arcanist exploit, or magus arcana class feature and you must either have observed a created magical effect you could not understand or have the Master CraftsmanUCA or the Unquenchable Hunger for KnowledgeUCA background
Description: Increase your ability modifier for calculating the effects and save DCs of one of your class features.
Prerequisites: or magus arcana class feature and you must either have observed a created magical effect you could not understand or have the Master CraftsmanUCA or the Unquenchable Hunger for KnowledgeUCA background

Name: Thief of Legend
PrerequisitesString: You must have stolen at least 1,000 gp worth of treasure without being caught and kept mementos of these thefts worth at least 500 gp, or have the Greed background.
Description: Master the ability to handle traps and locks
Prerequisites: You must have stolen at least 1
000 gp worth of treasure without being caught and kept mementos of these thefts worth at least 500 gp

Name: Town Tamer
PrerequisitesString: You must have 5 ranks in Intimidate and a personal motivation to clean up a particular town (such as an old friend calling in a favor, or seeking a place to settle down), or you must have the Bounty Hunter or Champion of the People background.
Description: Become more intimidating in specific settlements
Prerequisites: You must have 5 ranks in Intimidate and a personal motivation to clean up a particular town (such as an old friend calling in a favor
or seeking a place to settle down)
or you must have the Bounty Hunter or Champion of the People background.

Name: True Love
PrerequisitesString: You must have found love with a person you can't be with, have a current lover, or have the Current Lover, For Love, or The Lover background. Possible complications include distance, your love being with another, your feelings being unrequited, or your relationship being forbidden.
Description: Increase your skill with emotion spells and Sense Motive
Prerequisites: You must have found love with a person you can't be with
or The Lover background. Possible complications include distance

Name: Truth-Seeker
PrerequisitesString: You must have visited a ruin or forgotten place that has been abandoned for at least five times as long as you've been alive.
Description: Learn more about history, find secret doors with ease
Prerequisites: You must have visited a ruin or forgotten place that has been abandoned for at least five times as long as you've been alive.

Name: Twisted Love
PrerequisitesString: See text
Description: Gain a +2 bonus vs. enchantments and bonuses to influence your obsessed foe, and on completion, you can pretend to be affected by enchantments

Name: Unforgotten
PrerequisitesString: You must have a close relative, spouse, or other person dear to your heart who never returned from a journey, was captured, or otherwise vanished with little trace, or you have the Major Disaster background.
Description: Reduce nonlethal damage you take, increase your saving throw bonuses
Prerequisites: You must have a close relative
or other person dear to your heart who never returned from a journey
or otherwise vanished with little trace
or you have the Major Disaster background.

Name: Vengeance
PrerequisitesString: You must have a close family member or other loved one slain by a specific challenging foe or that foe's minions, or have the Raiders or Vengeance background.
Description: Receive a bonus against a specific foe and its minions
Prerequisites: You must have a close family member or other loved one slain by a specific challenging foe or that foe's minions
or have the Raiders or Vengeance background.

Name: Vengeful Banisher
PrerequisitesString: You witnessed at least one family member or a close friend being killed by demons or demonic cultists, or you have the Hated Foe or An Eye for an Eye background (see Ultimate Campaign).
Description: +2 save vs. spells/effects from demons and their worshipers
Prerequisites: You witnessed at least one family member or a close friend being killed by demons or demonic cultists
or you have the Hated Foe or An Eye for an Eye background (see Ultimate Campaign).

Name: Victory Through Unity
PrerequisitesString: You must have a familiar, and you must either be a member of House Merrosett or have the Initiated or Storied Lineage background
Description: Grant your familiar one of the hunter's animal aspects
Prerequisites: and you must either be a member of House Merrosett or have the Initiated or Storied Lineage background

Name: We are the Wall
PrerequisitesString: Be a member of House Darahan, or have the Champion of the People, Duty, or Raider background
Description: 3 times per day, you can declare a creature to be your quarry
Prerequisites: Be a member of House Darahan
or have the Champion of the People

Name: Wily Warrior
PrerequisitesString: Bluff 1 rank, Sense Motive 1 rank, base attack bonus +1, or you must have the Military Strategist background (page 5)
Description: Use your ranks in Sense Motive in place of your Will save.
Prerequisites: or you must have the Military Strategist background (page 5)

Name: Wretched Curator
PrerequisitesString: You must have purchased a scroll or spellbook containing a spell with the evil descriptor in a place where such dealings are illegal, or must have the Secret Society Inductee or Diabolical Upbringing background
Description: Purchase evil items cheaper, bonus to checks to understand evil items
Prerequisites: You must have purchased a scroll or spellbook containing a spell with the evil descriptor in a place where such dealings are illegal
or must have the Secret Society Inductee or Diabolical Upbringing background

Name: Weapon Style Mastery
PrerequisitesString: Any two style feats from different styles, base attack bonus +6, weapon training class feature with a melee weapon
Description: Have two weapon styles active at once
Prerequisites: Any two style feats from different styles
weapon training class feature with a melee weapon

Name: Ace Disarm
PrerequisitesString: Dex 13, Deadly Aim, Ranged Disarm (Ranged Tactics Toolbox 8), base attack bonus +6, weapon training class feature with a ranged weapon
Description: No penalty when using Ranged Disarm, make Steal attempts instead of Disarm at range

Name: Ace Trip
PrerequisitesString: Dex 13, Deadly Aim, Ranged Trip (Ranged Tactics Toolbox 9), base attack bonus +6, weapon training class feature with a ranged weapon
Description: No penalty when using Ranged Trip, make special ranged trips against flying creatures
Prerequisites: weapon training class feature with a ranged weapon

Name: Alien Mindpaths
PrerequisitesString: Android, kasatha, lashunta, or Triaxian
Description: Gain +4 on saves vs. mind-affecting effects and scrying

PrerequisitesString: Caster level 1st
Description: +2 bonus on level checks to overcome spell resistance

Name: Assisted Ascension

PrerequisitesString: Bardic performance or raging song

PrerequisitesString: Basic Harmony, Compelling Harmony, Perform (keyboard, percussion, sing, string, or wind) 10 ranks, bardic performance or raging song
Description: Increase the bonus of a performance by aiding with your own

PrerequisitesString: AntagonizeUM.
Description: When using Antagonize, directy hostility to willing ally

Name: Duck and Cover
